body_html:
There's some useful documentation under the "How-Tos" section of the tensorflow.org site. The one on "Reading Data" is most relevant to your question; in particular look here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/how_tos/reading_data/index.html#aside-how-clean-shut-down-when-limiting-epochs-works

FYI we use github issues primarily for bugs and installation issues. In the future please ask these types of questions on StackOverflow and tag it with the tensorflow tag. Thanks!

body:
There's some useful documentation under the "How-Tos" section of the tensorflow.org site.  The one on "Reading Data" is most relevant to your question; in particular look here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/how_tos/reading_data/index.html#aside-how-clean-shut-down-when-limiting-epochs-works

FYI we use github issues primarily for bugs and installation issues.  In the future please ask these types of questions on StackOverflow and tag it with the `tensorflow` tag.  Thanks!
